long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A gateway to cozy vibes from the comfort of your browser!

Cozy Kitties is a browser extension that shows you a cozy space every time you open a new tab.

Each space is the home for a kitty and a character. They change location and posture in each new tab you open!

Everything in the space and all the kitties have been hand-drawn with love.

In the future we will add more spaces, kitties, and good vibes!
